Thanks!

Case study looks good! Just a couple of minor edits….


Are we first able to increase the size of the text for the opening line and space it slightly out from the rest of the body of the text (‘How many times have you said "the cafe looks good ... but you can't hear a thing!")


Can we also please add in a couple of quotation boxes as we have done with our previous case studies?


Can we do this for the following paragraphs:


Through thought leadership, Acoufelt develops innovations that help to eliminate the trade-off between designing for the ear and designing for the eye. Acoufelt has a range of panels that feature QuietPrint™, printing at high resolution with no substantial impact on the acoustic performance of the base material.


(Can we keep this in its original section of the case study to break up the body of the text )


Acoufelt is all about Making Quiet™. We do this through holistic solutions based on our Acoustic FWC™ philosophy. Acoufelt sees every room as a cube with six sides. Each side of the cube, the floor, four walls and the ceiling, can either reverberate noise or become an integral part of the solution.


(Can we move this to the end of the case study)


Thanks so much – hope this makes sense!


Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
